Key Match Events: Jamiro Monteiro netted the first goal in the match in the 17th minute
Ghana pulled the game into a tie in the 56th minute with a goal by Alexander Djiku
Cape Verde regained their lead in the 92nd minute with a goal by Gary Rodriguez
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde held an unbeaten record in opening matches, with one win and two draws
With 24 appearances, the Ghanaian Black Stars stands as one of the most consistent teams in AFCON history, trailing only behind Egypt and Cote d'Ivoire
Others: Cape Verde emerged victorious in their Sunday clash with Ghana as part of the group stage of the  2024 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).
The game took place in the Stade Félix Houphouët-Boigny in Cote d'Ivoire at 9 p.m Morocco time.
